languages.text: Спустя годы после первой неудачной попытки культ святого Друза все же основал колонию на планете Йесевон. Учение, рожденное там, становилось все популярнее, хотя и говорили, что проповеди их об Императоре-Пращуре опасно неортодоксальны. Но адепты йесевонского учения настаивали на своей чистоте, указывая, что не отступают от писания, полученного из рук отче Иеронимуса Скорбного.

Years after its first unsuccessful attempt, the Cult of Saint Drusus finally colonised Jesevon. The teachings born there became more widespread, even in the wake of rumours that the sermons of the Emperor-Progenitor were dangerously unorthodox. Adepts of Jesevonism insisted on their purity, noting their accordance with the writings of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso.
languages.original_text: Спустя годы после первой неудачной попытки культ святого Друза все же основал колонию на планете Йесевон. Учение, рожденное там, становилось все популярнее, хотя и говорили, что проповеди их об Императоре-Пращуре опасно неортодоксальны. Но адепты йесевонского учения настаивали на своей чистоте, указывая, что не отступают от писания, полученного из рук отче Иеронимуса Скорбного.

traits.locale_text: Years after the first unsuccessful attempt to colonise Jesevon, the sect of Saint Drusus accomplished this deed. The teaching born there became more widespread, even in the wake of rumours that the sermons of the Emperor-Progenitor were dangerously unorthodox. Adepts of Jesevonism insisted on their purity, noting that they do not stray from the writings of Father Hieronymus Doloroso.

languages.text: 圣德鲁苏斯教派首次殖民以失败告终。多年之后，他们终于在杰西文顺利建立了殖民地。源自那里的教义传播极为广泛，即便有传言声称他们所谓的“元祖神皇”布道是极其危险的异端思想，教义的传播速度也没有丝毫减缓的趋势。杰西文的信徒坚持他们的纯洁，认为他们的信仰与希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师的著作一脉相承。
languages.original_text: Years after its first unsuccessful attempt, the Cult of Saint Drusus finally colonised Jesevon. The teachings born there became more widespread, even in the wake of rumours that the sermons of the Emperor-Progenitor were dangerously unorthodox. Adepts of Jesevonism insisted on their purity, noting their accordance with the writings of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso.

traits.locale_text: 圣德鲁苏斯教派首次殖民以失败告终。多年之后，他们终于在杰西文顺利建立了殖民地。源自那里的教义传播极为广泛，即便有传言声称他们所谓的“元祖神皇”布道是极其危险的异端思想，教义的传播速度也没有丝毫减缓的趋势。杰西文的信徒坚持他们的纯洁，认为他们的信仰与希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索神父的著作一脉相承。

languages.text: Jahre nach seinem ersten erfolglosen Versuch gelang es dem Kult des Heiligen Drusus endlich, Jesevon zu besiedeln. Die dort geborenen Lehren verbreiteten sich zunehmend, trotz der Gerüchte, dass die Predigten des Imperator-Progenitors gefährlich unorthodox waren. Adepten des Jesevonismus beharrten darauf, dass sie vollkommen rein seien, da sie im Einklang mit den Schriften von Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso stünden.
languages.original_text: Years after its first unsuccessful attempt, the Cult of Saint Drusus finally colonised Jesevon. The teachings born there became more widespread, even in the wake of rumours that the sermons of the Emperor-Progenitor were dangerously unorthodox. Adepts of Jesevonism insisted on their purity, noting their accordance with the writings of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso.

traits.locale_text: Jahre nach seinem ersten erfolglosen Versuch gelang es dem Kult des Heiligen Drusus endlich, Jesevon zu besiedeln. Die dort geborenen Lehren verbreiteten sich zunehmend, trotz der Gerüchte, dass die Predigten des Imperator-Progenitors gefährlich unorthodox waren. Adepten des Jesevonismus beharrten darauf, dass sie vollkommen rein seien, da sie im Einklang mit den Schriften von Vater Hieronymus Doloroso stünden.

languages.text: Des années après sa première tentative infructueuse, le Culte de Saint Drusus parvint enfin à coloniser Jesevon. Les doctrines qui y virent le jour se répandirent sans mal, malgré des rumeurs selon lesquelles les sermons de l'Empereur-Géniteur étaient dangereusement hétérodoxes. Cependant, les adeptes du jesevonisme clamaient sans cesse leur pureté, en soulignant leur respect des écrits du révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso.
languages.original_text: Years after its first unsuccessful attempt, the Cult of Saint Drusus finally colonised Jesevon. The teachings born there became more widespread, even in the wake of rumours that the sermons of the Emperor-Progenitor were dangerously unorthodox. Adepts of Jesevonism insisted on their purity, noting their accordance with the writings of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso.

traits.locale_text: Des années après sa première tentative infructueuse, le Culte de Saint Drusus parvint enfin à coloniser Jesevon. Les doctrines qui y virent le jour se répandirent sans mal, malgré des rumeurs selon lesquelles les sermons de l'Empereur-Géniteur étaient dangereusement hétérodoxes. Cependant, les adeptes du jesevonisme clamaient sans cesse leur pureté, en soulignant leur respect des écrits du père Hiéronymus Doloroso.

languages.text: Años después de su primer intento fallido, el Culto de San Drusus logró colonizar Jesevon. Las enseñanzas impartidas allí se extendieron, incluso a pesar de los rumores de que los sermones del Emperador-Progenitor eran peligrosamente heterodoxos. Los adeptos del jesevonismo insistían en su pureza, usando las escrituras del reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso como prueba.
languages.original_text: Years after its first unsuccessful attempt, the Cult of Saint Drusus finally colonised Jesevon. The teachings born there became more widespread, even in the wake of rumours that the sermons of the Emperor-Progenitor were dangerously unorthodox. Adepts of Jesevonism insisted on their purity, noting their accordance with the writings of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso.

traits.locale_text: Años después de su primer intento fallido, el Culto de San Drusus logró colonizar Jesevon. Las enseñanzas impartidas allí se extendieron, incluso a pesar de los rumores de que los sermones del Emperador-Progenitor eran peligrosamente heterodoxos. Los adeptos del jesevonismo insistían en su pureza, usando las escrituras del padre Hieronymus Doloroso como prueba.

languages.text: 最初の試みが失敗に終わった数年後、聖ドルスス教団はついにジェセヴォンを植民地化した。そこで生まれた教えは、皇帝の始祖の説教が危険なほど異端であるという噂が流れてもなお、さらに広まった。ジェセヴォン教の信奉者たちは、ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭の著作との一致を指摘し、その純粋性を主張した。
languages.original_text: Years after its first unsuccessful attempt, the Cult of Saint Drusus finally colonised Jesevon. The teachings born there became more widespread, even in the wake of rumours that the sermons of the Emperor-Progenitor were dangerously unorthodox. Adepts of Jesevonism insisted on their purity, noting their accordance with the writings of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso.

traits.locale_text: 最初の試みが失敗に終わった数年後、聖ドルスス教団はついにジェセヴォンを植民地化した。そこで生まれた教えは、皇帝の始祖の説教が危険なほど異端であるという噂が流れてもなお、さらに広まった。ジェセヴォン教の信奉者たちは、ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭の著作との一致を指摘し、その純粋性を主張した。

languages.text: Aziz Drusus Tarikatı, başarısız olan ilk teşebbüsten yıllar sonra nihayet Jesevon'u kolonileştirdi. Orada doğan öğretiler, Ata İmparator'un vaazlarının tehlikeli derecede alışılmışın dışında olduğuna dair söylentilere rağmen giderek yayıldı. Jesevonculuk üstatları, bu öğretilerin saf ve Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso'nun yazıtlarıyla uyumlu olduğu konusundaki ısrarını sürdürdü.
languages.original_text: Years after its first unsuccessful attempt, the Cult of Saint Drusus finally colonised Jesevon. The teachings born there became more widespread, even in the wake of rumours that the sermons of the Emperor-Progenitor were dangerously unorthodox. Adepts of Jesevonism insisted on their purity, noting their accordance with the writings of Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso.

traits.locale_text: İlk başarısız teşebbüsünün yıllar sonrasında Aziz Drusus Tarikatı nihayet Jesevon'u kolonileştirdi. Orada doğan öğretiler, Ata İmparator'un vaazlarının tehlikeli derecede alışılmışın dışında olduğuna dair söylentilere rağmen giderek daha fazla yayıldı. Jesevonculuk üstatları bu öğretilerin saf ve Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso'nun yazıtlarıyla uyum içinde olduğu konusunda ısrarcıydı.
